extends java.lang.Object

      • createCompany

        public void createCompany(Company company)
                   throws ApplicationException
        A method to create a new Company in the system. This method performs a safety check to make sure no company exists by the new company's name before creation. If a company exists by that name, throws an Application Excpetion.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        ApplicationException

      • updateCompany

        public void updateCompany(Company company)
                   throws ApplicationException
        A method which receives a company object. and replaces its details with the company details of the company in the database with the same id. This method makes sure that the company name has not been changed before updating details. Company name cannot be changed.
        Parameters:
        company -
        Throws:
        ApplicationException
